item.description:
We will describe how a typical runway show is set up and share experience about how photographers can find a good vantage point for shooting, as well as give you pointers about using the available runway lighting vs. using your on-camera flash.
A runway with stage lighting will be set up for a "Victoria’s Secret lingerie" style runway show so we can practice what we've learned and sharpen our own technique and style, in the process getting real runway-style images for our portfolios. Models will make multiple trips down the runway, using the same posing and moves that you would see in a real runway show, so you can learn to capture the moments you want, even if you miss them the first time.
There will be another set with strobe lighting for taking photo of model before them step up to the runway.

Models who signed up for this photoshoot:
Michelle MM#789671
Eleanor MM#1426378
Katelyn MM#718435
Kimberly MM#550085
Lacey MM#1529522
Kaitlyn MM#1280535
Natasha MM#327720

Timetable:
Setup runway and lighting 12:00 - 2:00 (we need some of you to help to do this)
MUA and models 1:00 - 2:00
Photoshoot 2:00 - 5:00
Cleanup 5:00 - 6:00 (we need your help on this as well)
All photographers, models, and makeup artists from this group are welcome and invited to attend.
Notes: We need 10 photographers minimum to sign up by February 20 in order to hold this event.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter front entrance, take the elevator to the 2nd floor and follow the sign to the photoshoot area
item.name: "Victoria’s Secret lingerie" style runway photoshoot
